name: Oculus Drift
description:
This is the result of my Honours project at Futureworks School of Media in Manchester. I have tried to make my interpretation of what it feels like to be sent flying through what would otherwise be an ordinary flat from the perspective of the miniature. 

This experience can be viewed without the Oculus Rift by selecting the mouse option on the menu and using mouse to orbit. 

If you would like to tweet me any feedback my twitter handle is @joegrainger or if you would like to check out my portfolio my website is www.joegrainger.com
